desc: The Scooter Shed stocks the world's best Scooters and Skateboards including MGP Scooters, Envy Scooters, and Lucky Scooters. We stock accessories incl helmets, wheels, grips etc. The brands we offer have been thoroughly tested and recommended by our 2 sons.

layout.text: We are an online-based family business dedicated to bringing you the best deals from the world's best brands.
